history.proof: intros dec_fun ex_p. apply constructive_indefinite_ground_description_nat_Acc with (P:=p). - apply dec_fun. - destruct ex_p as [y py]. exists y. auto.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat -> Prop dec_fun : forall x : nat, dec (p x) y : nat py : p y H : forall P : nat -> Prop, (exists n : nat, P n) -> forall y : nat, (fun x y0 : nat => x = S y0 /\\ ~ P y0) y 0 -> Acc (fun x y0 : nat => x = S y0 /\\ ~ P y0) y Unable to unify "Acc (fun x y : nat => x = S y /\\ ~ ?M1573 y) ?M1575" with "exists n : nat, p n".

original: intros dec_fun ex_p. apply constructive_indefinite_ground_description_nat_Acc with (P:=p). - apply dec_fun. - destruct ex_p as [y py]. apply P_eventually_implies_acc_ex. exists y. auto.
